itemDescription: Scottish judoka and Commonwealth Games medal winner

wikipedia_page.main:
Kimberley Renicks (11 February 1988, Bellshill) is a Scottish Judoka.
She won the Commonwealth gold in the Women's 48 kg Judo event at the 2014 Commonwealth Games in Glasgow. Her older sister Louise is also a judoka who won a gold medal at the same Games.
On 22 February 2018, it was announced that National Tyres and Autocare were to become a sponsor of Renicks.
